name: Mirror Media
tag_list: social-discovery, social-search, people-search, online-dating, social-networks, social-media
overview:
Mirror is a leading social discovery platform that allows people to connect in a more meaningful way for dating, social or professional purposes.

The problem Mirror solves is simple: There is no way to search for people online who possess the qualities and interests you desire, whether it be for dating, social or professional purposes, and be able to connect with them in a quick, easy and verified manner.

Your current options are: 1) Facebook, a great means of connecting and sharing content with friends and family. 2) Online dating sites, which are filled with misleading or downright fake anonymous profiles. 3) Craigslist (shudder). 4) LinkedIn, which offers some of this functionality, but is limited to the white-collar, professional realm. Mirror is like LinkedIn for the next generation.

Another problem that Mirror solves is online reputation. Mirror allows users to enhance their online reputation through their frame and takes. This can come in handy for social and professional purposes. There are many businesses which enable individuals, for a hefty fee, to deemphasize unwanted items on them in the search ranking. Mirror functions in an opposite and more proactive manner. Mirror enables users to produce a complete story of who they are as told by the people who know them best. Mirror users can invite their friends, family and co-workers to highlight their best traits and unique qualities. Thus, Mirror is revolutionizing two businesses which have not progressed much in over a decade; online people search and online dating. It is much more than a verified online dating site or social search engine. Itâ€™s a new form of web interaction. Mirror is the new social.
